name: Monster Tapper (bdowling7)
description:
Simple monster tapper game that spawns random monsters of varying strength. Titlescreen, background music, effects, and aesthetic upgrades etc.

Credits:

Background Music: Johann Sebastian Bach - Toccata and Fugue in D Minor

TitleScreen Image: Dark Castle Tileset by author Fabian Fuchs

Various Monster Images: 2D Animated Halloween Characters by author Motionsorcery and Demon Pixel Art Character by author sanctumpixel

Various Icon Imagery: Shikashi's Fantasy Icons Pack by author cheekyinkling

Last Edit: Added the version that has the new save Game data function. However this is now causing other issues with the upgrade buttons so for now I have reverted the game to the local storage variant.
